Public Remarks: Exquisite, architecturally designed, large family home situated on one of the nicest view lots in Dundarave. Great layout and attention to detail has gone into this home. Main floor comes complete with views from living room, formal dining room, large kitchen with eating area, glass covered deck and a family room, plus a large den/bedroom. Upstairs features 5 large bedrooms, all with south facing views plus laundry room. Walk out basement has fantastic recreation room with wood burning stove. The home rests on an over-sized lot with a 73 foot frontage.  New (2015) roof and plenty of storage throughout. Located in a great neighborhood, only a short walk away from Dundarave Village, shopping, recreation and excellent schools.

Public Remarks: This irreplaceable family estate is located on a one of a kind ½ Acre private, gated lot. Stunning home has been designed with a casual elegance that is unparalleled in today's market & located in the prestigious upper Edgemont Village. The tree lined driveway unfolds onto a 7000 sqft estate which boasts a 25’ vaulted great room with floor to ceiling windows overlooking a completely private, flat, usable south facing yard. 20-ft collapsing doors open to a covered entertainer's paradise with mountian views,fire pit, hot tub, outdoor dining/kitchen. Backyard has ample room for a sports court/dream pool. Reclaimed wood, brick & concrete treatments, juxtapose clean contemporary finishes throughout the home reminiscent of a ‘modern barn’. Appointment needed, please do not walk property.
